title: Blood Supply Chain Management
description: A medical logistics officer must manage the supply of blood products to a forward surgical team, ensuring it remains within its temperature-controlled limits.

tasks.description: Check the current inventory and expiration dates of blood products at the surgical team's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer identifies that the team is low on Type O blood.

tasks.description: Arrange for a resupply of Type O blood from the nearest blood bank.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully orders the needed blood products.

tasks.description: Track the shipment in real-time, monitoring its temperature to ensure the cold chain is not broken.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer monitors the shipment and confirms it arrives safely and within temperature limits.
